description: Explore effective strategies for monetizing open source software (OSS) while maintaining innovation and community trust. Learn about various methods including paid support, freemium models, dual licensing, sponsorships, and more.
keywords: open source, monetization, OSS, paid support, freemium model, dual licensing, crowdfunding, sponsorships, marketplaces, innovation, tech industry
title: Monetizing Open Source: Balancing Innovation with Revenue
